alert.note: Alert for Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 10:28AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MISSISSIPPI...SOUTH CENTRAL PEMISCOT...SOUTHWESTERN DYER AND NORTH CENTRAL LAUDERDALE COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 AM CST... At 1028 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dell, or near Blytheville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Gosnell, Cooter, Dell, Burdette, Heloise, Barr, Dearman, Barfield, Tomato, Hightower, Tuckertown, Burton, Tiger Tail, Hickman, Lens Ford, Wilson Junction, Stark City, Number Nine, and Armorel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
